definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">72</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="entity_set_rotation"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="yaw"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:Gradus</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="shoot_arrow"><field name="rangeditem">Arrow</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="damage"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="knockback"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:Gradus</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:Gradus</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="spawn_gem"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:MagicHammer</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
